hello
I have a little information that might help. has
anyone ever read the book samurai  the story of a
warrior tradition. I have the book and to me is very
interesting.the book tells you about the first
warriors which is the first chapter down to chapter
nine which is  the samurai legacy. the chapters in
between are  chapter 2 emergence of the samurai,
chapter 3 the rise to power chapter 4 the mongol
invasions, chapter 5 the age of the country at war,
chapter 6  the path to unification, chapter 7  from
warriors to bureaucrats, chapter 7 the black ships, my
interest in the book was to read about  Tokugawa 
Ieyasu to me I think he was one of the best samurai
that lived. 

          thanking you for your time
                J. Rammutt
